Text.Page:
These {@LinkCreature:13#300541#rockcrawlers} are eating the relics around here.

Every time one of them pulverizes an outcropping, Eria lets out a piercing scream. For the sake of all our ears, can you go out and retrieve some relic fragments from them before it's too late?
This should be enough for now. I saw Eria peeking around a pillar at you while you were fighting...I think she's a fan of your work.

I'm going to need more than just promises to pacify that woman. I think Leander's got those long ears completely stuffed with fabric to block out Eria's screams.

Please, , I'm begging you. Help a poor soldier out and bring me back something I can use.
